patterns: How do I apply for scholarships?
What types of financial aid are available?
Do you offer scholarships for student?
responses:
Our university offers a wide range of scholarship opportunities to our students who choose Cyprus Science University and study at our university.
 Taking into account students' individual differences, personal characteristics, social and artistic skills, sports abilities and character structures along with the required exam results, 
 various scholarship opportunities are offered to our students who are successful in sports, science, art and social volunteering based studies, 
 in addition to ÖSYM and preference scholarships.
 Scholarships continue within the framework of our university's scholarship regulations

A 100% scholarship is given to students who are among the top 1000 students in any score type in the University Entrance Exams organized annually by the TR Higher Education Council Measurement,
 Selection and Placement Center and who are placed in one of the Cyprus Science University programs.
 In addition, 75% of the students who ranked among the top 1001 - 2000 in the same exam;
 Students who fall between 2001 and 3000 are 50%; Students who rank between 3001 and 4000 are supported with a 25% scholarship rate.
